name: Quantum of Solace
tagline: James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organization from eliminating a country's most valuable resource. All the while, he still tries to seek revenge over the death of his love.

name: Wild Hogs
tagline: A group of suburban biker wannabes looking for adventure hit the open road, but get more than they bargained for when they encounter a New Mexico gang called the Del Fuegos.

name: 3 Men and a Baby
tagline: Three bachelors find themselves forced to take care of a baby left by one of the guys' girlfriends.

name: Casino Royale
tagline: Armed with a license to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007 and must defeat a weapons dealer in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, but things are not what they seem.

name: Meet the Parents
tagline: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.
A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.

name: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
tagline: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

name: Kung Fu Panda 2
tagline: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

name: Hannibal
tagline: Hannibal returns to America and attempts to make contact with disgraced Agent Starling and survive a vengeful victim's plan.

name: Catch Me If You Can
tagline: A true story about Frank Abagnale Jr., who, before his 19th birthday, successfully conned millions of dollars' worth of checks as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor.

name: The Proposal
tagline: A pushy boss forces her young assistant to marry her in order to keep her Visa status in the U.S. and avoid deportation to Canada.

name: Big Daddy
tagline: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

name: The Sound of Music
tagline: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

name: Clash of the Titans
tagline: Perseus, mortal son of Zeus, battles the minions of the underworld to stop them from conquering heaven and earth.

name: Batman Returns
tagline: When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them, while the Catwoman has her own agenda.

name: Django Unchained
tagline: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

name: A Bug's Life
tagline: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

name: The Pursuit of Happyness
tagline: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional endeavor.

name: Grown Ups
tagline: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

name: The Waterboy
tagline: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

name: Ice Age: Continental Drift
tagline: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.

name: Shark Tale
tagline: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidently killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother both decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

name: Die Another Day
tagline: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

name: The Sting
tagline: In 1930s Chicago, a young con man seeking revenge for his murdered partner teams up with a master of the big con to win a fortune from a criminal banker.

name: The Heat
tagline: An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.

name: The Firm
tagline: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

name: The Longest Yard
tagline: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

name: X-Men
tagline: Two mutants come to a private academy for their kind whose resident superhero team must oppose a terrorist organization with similar powers.

name: Scary Movie
tagline: A year after disposing the body of a man they accidently killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.

name: Fatal Attraction
tagline: A married man's one night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

name: What Lies Beneath
tagline: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she's losing her mind.

name: The Mummy
tagline: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a Mummy.

name: Snow White and the Huntsman
tagline: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

name: Fast & Furious
tagline: Brian O'Conner, now working for the FBI in LA, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

name: Over the Hedge
tagline: A scheming raccoon fools a mismatched family of forest creatures into helping him repay a debt of food, by invading the new suburban sprawl that popped up while they were hibernating...and learns a lesson about family himself.

name: Fantastic Four
tagline: A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom

name: Horton Hears a Who!
tagline: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.

name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
tagline: A toon hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

name: Beverly Hills Cop II
tagline: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogamil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.

name: Jerry Maguire
tagline: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent with the only athlete who stays with him.

name: Scooby-Doo
tagline: After an acrimonious break up, the Mystery Inc. gang are individually brought to an island resort to investigate strange goings on.

name: 101 Dalmatians
tagline: When a litter of dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella De Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

name: Sex and the City
tagline: A New York writer on sex and love is finally getting married to her Mr. Big. But her three best girlfriends must console her after one of them inadvertently leads Mr. Big to jilt her.

name: Runaway Bride
tagline: A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiances at the altar.

name: Rambo: First Blood Part II
tagline: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

name: We're the Millers
tagline: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.

name: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 3. Produktions KG

tagline: A robotic warrior from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a 20-year old drifter and his future wife from an most advanced robotic assassin and to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

name: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
tagline: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

name: American Hustle
tagline: A con man, Irving Rosenfeld, along with his seductive partner Sydney Prosser, is forced to work for a wild FBI agent, Richie DiMaso, who pushes them into a world of Jersey powerbrokers and mafia.

name: Puss in Boots
tagline: The events leading up to the sword fighting cat's meeting with Shrek and his friends.

name: Les Misérables
tagline: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives for ever.

name: Knocked Up
tagline: For fun loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant.

name: Little Fockers
tagline: Family-patriarch Jack Byrnes wants to appoint a successor. Does his son-in-law, the male nurse Greg Focker have what it takes?

name: Megamind
tagline: The supervillain Megamind finally defeats his nemesis, the superhero Metro Man. But without a hero, he loses all purpose and must find new meaning to his life.

name: Hotel Transylvania
tagline: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teen-aged daughter.

name: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
tagline: #1 NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.

name: Gremlins
tagline: A boy inadvertantly breaks 3 important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

name: Gran Torino
tagline: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

name: As Good as It Gets
tagline: A single mother/waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is in an accident.

name: Lethal Weapon 2
tagline: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

name: X-Men: First Class
tagline: In 1962, the United States government enlists the help of Mutants with superhuman abilities to stop a malicious dictator who is determined to start world war III.

name: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
tagline: When a shopping mall is taken over by a gang of organized crooks, it's up to a mild-mannered security guard to save the day.

name: True Lies
tagline: Harry Tasker is a secret agent for the United States Government. For years, he has kept his job from his wife, but is forced to reveal his identity and try to stop nuclear terrorists when he and his wife are kidnapped by the terrorists.

name: Lilo & Stitch
tagline: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive from the law.

name: American Pie 2
tagline: The continuing bawdy adventures of a group of friends reuniting after their first year of college.

name: Taken
tagline: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

name: The Santa Clause
tagline: When a man inadvertantly kills Santa on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

name: The Great Gatsby
tagline: A Midwestern war veteran finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor.

name: I, Robot

production.name: Mediastream Vierte Film GmbH & Co. Vermarktungs KG

tagline: In the year 2035 a techno-phobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

name: Lethal Weapon 3
tagline: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue an arms dealer who is a former LAPD officer.

name: The Fast and the Furious

production.name: Mediastream Film GmbH & Co. Productions KG

tagline: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

name: Doctor Dolittle
tagline: A Doctor finds out that he can understand what animals are saying. And the animals find out that he understands.

name: Mamma Mia!
tagline: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular '70s group ABBA.

name: Rio
tagline: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with this bird of his dreams.

name: Juno
tagline: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes an unusual decision regarding her unborn child.

name: Marley & Me
tagline: A family learns important life lessons from their adorable, but naughty and neurotic dog.

name: Divergent
tagline: In a world divided by factions based on virtues, Tris learns she's Divergent and won't fit in. When she discovers a plot to destroy Divergents, Tris and the mysterious Four must find out what makes Divergents dangerous before it's too late.

name: The Smurfs
tagline: When the evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue Smurfs out of their village, they tumble from their magical world into New York City.

name: The Jungle Book
tagline: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

name: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
tagline: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.

name: Animal House
tagline: At a 1962 College, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

name: Pocahontas
tagline: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

name: A Few Good Men
tagline: Neo military lawyer Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder; they contend they were acting under orders.

name: Slumdog Millionaire
tagline: A Mumbai teen who grew up in the slums, becomes a contestant on the Indian version of "Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?" He is arrested under suspicion of cheating, and while being interrogated, events from his life history are shown which explain why he knows the answers.

name: xXx
tagline: Xander Cage is an extreme sports athelete recruited by the government on a special mission.

name: Rush Hour
tagline: Two cops team up to get back a kidnapped daughter.

name: The Blair Witch Project
tagline: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

name: Deep Impact
tagline: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?

name: Look Who's Talking
tagline: After a single, career-minded woman is left on her own to give birth to the child of a married man, she finds a new romantic chance in a cab driver. Meanwhile the point-of-view of the newborn boy is narrated through voice over.

name: Rush Hour 3
tagline: After an attempted assassination on Ambassador Han, Lee and Carter head to Paris to protect a French woman with knowledge of the Triads' secret leaders.

name: Stuart Little
tagline: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
tagline: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

name: Taken 2
tagline: In Istanbul, retired CIA operative Bryan Mills and his wife are taken hostage by the father of a kidnapper Mills killed while rescuing his daughter.

name: Sister Act
tagline: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

name: The Matrix Revolutions
tagline: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

name: The Santa Clause 2
tagline: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for nearly ten years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

name: The King's Speech
tagline: The story of King George VI of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, his impromptu ascension to the throne and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch become worthy of it.

name: Cheaper by the Dozen
tagline: With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood.

name: 21 Jump Street
tagline: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

name: Bad Boys II
tagline: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstacy into Florida.
